text: Bilbija is a Serbo-Croatian surname, derived from bilbil, the Serbo-Croatian variant of the Turkish word bülbül meaning "nightingale". Notable people with the surname include: *Nemanja Bilbija (born 1990), Bosnian footballer, son of Milorad *Nenad Bilbija (born 1984), Slovene handball player *Milorad Bilbija (born 1964), retired Bosnian footballer, father of Nemanja Category:Bosnian- language surnames Category:Serbian-language surnames
title: Bilbija
